name: Liviu Iancu
tagline: Collection of tutorials and projects made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
body:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LiviuLvu/LiviuLvu.github.io/master/images/frontcrash.jpg)

## Welcome to my GitHub Test Pages
Below is a list of selected web tutorials and personal learning projects made with javaScript and related frontend technologies.  
Left side is the app name.  
Right side shows the languages and libraries used to build the app.  
Most recent projects on top.  

## List of selected tutorials and web projects  
* [.psd to HTMl conversion, responsive layout](http://lvudesign.com/test-agency/)
    --- Sublime Text, npm, grunt, browser-sync, watch, stylus.css, flexbox, jquery   
* [.psd to HTMl conversion, responsive layout]
    (http://lvudesign.com/test-responsive/)
    --- Sublime Text, npm, grunt, browser-sync, watch, stylus.css, flexbox, jquery
* [One page website with smooth scroll]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/Bootstrap3_onePage_tut2)
    --- CSS Bootstrap 3
* [One page website tutorial]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/Bootstrap3_onePage_tut1)
    --- CSS Bootstrap 3
* [Map location pointers]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/map_custom_directive)
    --- angular.js, leaflet.js
* [Outbox2]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/outbox2)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Reader]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/reader)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Calendar]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/calendar)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Front page]
    (https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/airbnb_website)
    --- html, css, bootstrap
* [Table, Calculating total price]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/calculate_total_price/)
    --- angular js
* [Button hides text]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/isolated_scope_directive/)
    --- angular.js, bootstrap
* [Movie list, sortable, with add function]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/movie_list_sortable_add/)
    --- angular.js
* [Menu Bar]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/nav_menu/)
    --- angular.js
* [Search functionality]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/search_simple_example/)
    --- angular.js
* [Form updates data displayed, reset form]
    (http://liviulvu.github.io/form_update_data/)
    --- angular.js
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
